endesc: Long・If you've been overtaken in the middle of the pack during the Middle Leg, you will will drain stamina from enemy girls ahead of you, and will get a speed boost

jpname: ひたむきサンタクロース
jpdesc: 中盤始めの方で持久力をすごく回復する＜作戦・先行＞
endesc: Leader・At a random point during the first half of the Middle Leg, your stamina will recover tremendously

jpdesc: レース終盤が迫ったとき持久力をすごく使ってしばらくの間速度をすごく上げる＜作戦・先行＞
enname: Leave the Dark Nights to Me!
endesc: Leader・At a random point during the second half of the Middle Leg, use a little extra stamina to greatly increase your speed

jpdesc: レース中盤以降に追い抜くと終盤の最終直線に入ったとき少しの間速度が上がる作戦が追込で中盤以降に3回以上追い抜くと少しの間ものすごく上がる
endesc: If you overtake someone during the Middle Leg or later, then on the Last Straight, your speed will increase; (Chaser only) if you overtake at least three times, your speed will increase tremendously instead

jpdesc: レース後半に追い抜こうとすると速度が上がる＜作戦・追込＞
endesc: Chaser・If you try to overtake someone during the second half of the race, your speed will increase

jpdesc: レース中盤に前方にいると速度が上がる＜先行・長距離＞
endesc: Leader・Long・If you're in the first half of the pack at a random point during the Middle Leg, your speed will increase

jpdesc: レース中盤に前方にいると速度がわずかに上がる＜先行・長距離＞
endesc: Leader・Long・If you're in the first half of the pack at a random point during the Middle Leg, your speed will slightly increase

jpdesc: ラストスパートの最中に速度が上がる＜作戦・先行＞
endesc: Leader・At a random point during the first half of the Last Spurt, your speed will increase

jpdesc: ラストスパートの最中に速度がわずかに上がる＜作戦・先行＞
endesc: Leader・At a random point during the first half of the Last Spurt, your speed will slightly increase

jpdesc: レース後半に追い抜こうとすると速度がすごく上がる＜作戦・追込＞
endesc: Chaser・If you try to overtake someone during the second half of the race, your speed will greatly increase

jpdesc: レース中盤のコーナーでしばらくの間少し前に出る、その後最終直線でわずかに前に出る
endesc: During a random Middle Leg corner, you will get a small speed boost; then, on the Last Straight, your will get a small speed boost again

jpdesc: レース後半で中団にいるとき追い抜こうとするか近寄られると残り400m地点で速度が上がる非根幹距離のレースならすごく上がる
endesc: If you were in the middle of the pack trying to overtake someone or someone tried to overtake you anywhere during the second half of the race, then with 400 m remaining in the race, your speed will increase; in non-core (not divisible by 400) races, it will increase greatly instead

jpdesc: 終盤の最終コーナー以降にいるときライバルのウマ娘が速度スキルを発動するとしばらくの間少し前に出る＜中距離/長距離＞
endesc: Medium/Long・When another girl activates a speed skill during the Final Corner or beyond, you will get a speed boost

jpdesc: 終盤の最終コーナー以降にいるときライバルのウマ娘が速度スキルを発動するとしばらくの間ちょっと前に出る＜中距離/長距離＞
endesc: Medium/Long・When another girl activates a speed skill during the Final Corner or beyond, you will get a marginal speed boost

jpdesc: レース中盤の直線で持久力を使って速度をものすごく上げる、中山レース場の長距離レースなら持久力を使わずに効果が増える＜作戦・差し＞
endesc: Betweener・At a random point during any Middle Leg straight, use a little extra stamina to increase your speed tremendously; in Long-distance Nakayama races, the effect is even stronger and doesn't use extra stamina

jpdesc: 終盤の最終コーナー以降にいるときライバルのウマ娘が速度スキルを発動するとしばらくの間前に出る＜中距離/長距離＞
endesc: Medium/Long・When another girl activates a speed skill during the Final Corner or beyond, you will get a speed boost

jpdesc: レース後半に後方にいると残りの持久力に応じたロングスパートをかけて速度をわずかに上げ続ける
endesc: If you're in the second half of the pack during the second half of the race, your speed will increase; the more stamina you have remaining, the bigger the increase

jpdesc: レース後半まで前方をキープしていると長時間速度を少し上げ続ける「大逃げ」が発動していると効果が変わり持久力をすごく回復する＜中距離＞
endesc: Medium・If you were in the top 40% for the entire first half of the race, your speed will slightly increase; if you activated the 大逃げ (Great Escape) skill, then instead of increasing speed, your stamina will recover tremendously instead

jpdesc: レース終盤始めの方早めに中団以降にいると加速力が上がる＜追込・長距離＞
endesc: Chaser・Long・At a random point during the first quarter of the Final Leg, if you're not in the front of the pack, your acceleration will increase

jpdesc: 終盤の最終コーナーで3番手以内にいると加速力が上がる＜逃げ・中距離＞
endesc: Runner・Medium・If you're third or better during the Final Corner or beyond, your acceleration will increase

jpdesc: 終盤の最終コーナーで3番手以内にいると加速力がわずかに上がる＜逃げ・中距離＞
endesc: Runner・Medium・If you're third or better during the Final Corner or beyond, your acceleration will slightly increase

jpdesc: 最終コーナー前の第3コーナーで前方にいると前に出る＜逃げ・中距離＞
endesc: Runner・Medium・If you're in the first half of the pack at a random point on the third corner, you will get a speed boost

jpdesc: 最終コーナー前の第3コーナーで前方にいるとわずかに前に出る＜逃げ・中距離＞
endesc: Runner・Medium・If you're in the first half of the pack at a random point on the third corner, you will get a slight speed boost

jpdesc: レース終盤始めの方早めに前方にいると加速力がわずかに上がる＜逃げ・中距離＞
endesc: Runner・Medium・If you're in the first half of the pack at a random point during the first quarter of the Final Leg, your acceleration will slightly increase

jpdesc: ラストスパートの最中に速度がわずかに上がる＜中距離＞
endesc: Medium・At a random point during the first half of the Last Spurt, your speed will slightly increase

jpdesc: レース終盤始めの方早めに前方にいると加速力がわずかに上がる＜先行・中距離＞
endesc: Leader・Medium・If you're in the first half of the pack at a random point during the first quarter of the Final Leg, your acceleration will slightly increase

jpname: 甘さ控えめエスケープ
jpdesc: 賢さが十二分に高いならレース終盤が迫ったとき前方にいるとしばらくの間速度が上がる＜作戦・逃げ＞
endesc: Runner・If you're in the first half of the pack at a random point during the Middle Leg and your base Wisdom is at least 1200, your speed will increase

jpdesc: 最終コーナー前の第3コーナーで前に出る、レース後半に追い抜いているとしばらくの間前に出る＜中距離/長距離＞
endesc: Medium/Long・At a random point during the third corner, you will get a speed boost; bonus duration if you overtook someone during the second half of the race

jpdesc: レース終盤始めの方早めに加速力が上がる、スキル発動時中団以降にいるとすごく上がる＜追込・長距離＞
endesc: Chaser・Long・At a random point during the first quarter of the Final Leg, your acceleration will increase; it will increase greatly if you're not in the front of the pack

jpdesc: 終盤の最終コーナーで3番手以内にいると加速力が上がり前に出る＜逃げ・中距離＞
endesc: Runner・Medium・If you're third or better during the Final Corner or beyond, your acceleration will increase and you will get a speed boost

jpdesc: 最終コーナー前の第3コーナーで前方にいるとすごく前に出る＜逃げ・中距離＞
endesc: Runner・Medium・If you're in the first half of the pack at a random point on the third corner, you will get a great speed boost

jpname: 霊験灼然チョベリグ神託
jpdesc: レース中盤始めに前方にいるとき追い抜こうとするか近寄られると少しの間少し前に出る、マイルレースなら少しの間すごく前に出る
endesc: During the first half of the Middle Leg, if you're in the front, and if you're trying to overtake someone or someone is trying to overtake you, you will get a speed boost; the effect is much stronger in Mile races

jpdesc: レース終盤始めの方に中団以降にいると加速力がわずかに上がる＜差し・短距離＞
endesc: Betweener・Short・If you're not in the front at a random point during the first half of the Final Leg, your acceleration will slightly increase

jpdesc: レース後半に近寄られると速度が上がる＜作戦・逃げ＞
endesc: Runner・If someone tries to overtake you during the second half of the race, your speed will increase

jpdesc: レース後半に近寄られると速度がわずかに上がる＜作戦・逃げ＞
endesc: Runner・If someone tries to overtake you during the second half of the race, your speed will slightly increase

jpdesc: 追い抜こうとするか近寄られるとすごく前に出る＜逃げ・マイル＞
endesc: Runner・Mile・If you're trying to overtake someone or someone is trying to overtake you, you will get a great speed boost

jpdesc: レース後半に近寄られるとすごく前に出る＜逃げ・マイル＞
endesc: Runner・Mile・If someone tries to overtake you during the second half of the race, you will get a great speed boost

jpdesc: レース中盤に前方で競り合うとレース後半に少しの間速度が上がる大井か川崎か船橋レース場なら上げ続ける
endesc: If you were blocked from the side in the first half of the pack during the Middle Leg, then halfway through the race, your speed will increase; the effect lasts longer on Ooi, Kawasaki, and Funabashi racetracks

jpdesc: 追い比べをしていると残り200mを切ってから前に出る＜逃げ/先行＞
endesc: Runner/Leader・If you participated in at least one Showdown (追い比べ) during the Final Straight, then with 200 m remaining in the race, you will get a speed boost

jpdesc: 追い比べをしていると残り200mを切ってからわずかに前に出る＜逃げ/先行＞
endesc: Runner/Leader・If you participated in at least one Showdown (追い比べ) during the Final Straight, then with 200 m remaining in the race, you will get a slight speed boost

jpdesc: レース中盤の直線で速度が上がるダートレースならしばらくの間速度が上がる＜マイル/中距離＞
endesc: Mile/Medium・At a random point during a random Middle Leg straight, your speed will increase; the effect lasts longer on Dirt tracks

jpdesc: 追い比べをしていると残り200mを切ってからすごく前に出る＜逃げ/先行＞
endesc: Runner/Leader・If you participated in at least one Showdown (追い比べ) during the Final Straight, then with 200 m remaining in the race, you will get a great speed boost

jpdesc: 残り350m地点で前方にいると少しの間前に出る、さらにマイルレースなら速度がわずかに上がる
endesc: If you're in the first half of the pack with 350 m remaining in the race, you will get an (immediate) speed boost; in Mile races, your (target) speed will additionally also slightly increase

jpdesc: レース中間付近で前方にいると速度が上がる、賢さが十二分に高いとすごく上がる＜短距離＞
endesc: Short・If you're in the front halfway through the race, your speed will increase; it will increase greatly if your base Wisdom is at least 1200

jpdesc: レース終盤始めの方で前方にいると加速力が上がる＜逃げ・短距離＞
endesc: Runner・Short・If you're in the first half of the pack during the first half of the Final Leg, your acceleration will increase

jpdesc: レース終盤始めの方で前方にいると加速力がわずかに上がる＜逃げ・短距離＞
endesc: Runner・Short・If you're in the first half of the pack during the first half of the Final Leg, your acceleration will slightly increase

jpdesc: レース終盤始めの方で前方にいると加速力が上がる＜先行・短距離＞
endesc: Leader・Short・If you're in the first half of the pack during the first half of the Final Leg, your acceleration will increase

jpdesc: レース終盤始めの方で前方にいると加速力がわずかに上がる＜先行・短距離＞
endesc: Leader・Short・If you're in the first half of the pack during the first half of the Final Leg, your acceleration will slightly increase

jpdesc: レース終盤が迫ったとき中団以降だとしばらくの間速度が上がる＜短距離＞
endesc: Short・If you're not near the front during the second half of the Middle Leg, your speed will increase

jpdesc: レース中盤に前の方にいるとしばらくの間速度が上がる＜作戦・先行＞
endesc: Leader・If you're in the first half of the pack at a random point during the Middle Leg, your speed will increase

jpdesc: レース終盤目前以降に先頭か先頭から4バ身以内だとしばらくの間速度が少し上がる＜先行・マイル＞
endesc: Leader・Mile・If you're leading or less than 10 meters away from the 1st place anywhere during the last 40% of the race, your speed will slightly increase

jpdesc: スタート時に加速力がわずかに上がる出遅れていない場合その後レース中盤に前方にいるとしばらくの間速度が上がる＜逃げ・短距離＞
endesc: Runner・At the start of the race, your acceleration will slightly increase; if you didn't have a late start and you're in the first half of the pack, then at a random point during the Middle Leg, your speed will increase

jpname: 覚えていてくださいね？
jpdesc: レース終盤始めの方早めに前方にいると加速力が上がる＜逃げ・短距離＞
endesc: Runner・Short・If you're in the first half of the pack during the first quarter of the Final Leg, your acceleration will increase

jpdesc: レース終盤に追い抜くと最終直線で速度が少し上がる
endesc: If you've overtaken someone during the Final Leg, then on the Final Straight, your speed will slightly increase

jpname: 燃え盛るは絶対の意志
jpdesc: レース終盤に追い抜くと最終直線で速度が上がる
endesc: If you've overtaken someone during the Final Leg, then on the Final Straight, your speed will increase

jpdesc: コーナーで速度が上がる＜作戦・先行＞
endesc: Leader・At a random point on a random corner, your speed will increase

jpdesc: コーナーで速度がすごく上がる＜作戦・先行＞
endesc: Leader・At a random point on a random corner, your speed will greatly increase

jpdesc: コーナーで前に出て持久力をわずかに回復する＜中距離＞
endesc: Medium・At a random point on a random corner, you will get a speed boost and your stamina will slightly recover

jpname: 我が覇道、阻むものなし
jpdesc: 残り1000m地点で少し前に出続ける中距離か長距離レースで全ての基礎能力が十分に高いと前に出続ける＜作戦・追込＞
endesc: Chaser・1000 m before the end of the race, you will get a speed boost; the effect is stronger if all your base stats are at least 1000

jpdesc: コーナーで速度が上がる＜ダート＞
endesc: Dirt・At a random point on a random corner, your speed will increase

jpdesc: ラストスパートの最中に速度が上がる＜中距離＞
endesc: Medium・At a random point during the first half of the Last Spurt, your speed will increase

jpdesc: レース中盤に前に出る
endesc: At a random point during the Middle Leg, you will get a speed boost

jpdesc: レース中盤にわずかに前に出る
endesc: At a random point during the Middle Leg, you will get a slight speed boost

jpdesc: レース中盤始めの方に中団以降にいると速度が上がり持久力をわずかに回復する＜中距離/長距離＞
endesc: Medium/Long・If you're not in the front at a random point during the first half of the Middle Leg, your speed will increase and your stamina will slightly recover

jpdesc: レース中盤始めの方に中団以降にいると速度がわずかに上がり持久力をほんのわずかに回復する＜中距離/長距離＞
endesc: Medium/Long・If you're not in the front at a random point during the first half of the Middle Leg, your speed will slightly increase and your stamina will marginally recover

jpdesc: レース終盤始めの方早めに中団以降にいると加速力がわずかに上がる＜追込・中距離＞
endesc: Chaser・Medium・If you're not in the front at a random point during the first quarter of the Final Leg, your acceleration will slightly increase

jpdesc: 上り坂で速度がわずかに上がる＜作戦・追込＞
endesc: Chaser・At a random point on a random uphill, your speed will slightly increase

jpdesc: ラストスパートの最中に速度が上がるファンが多いほど効果が高まる
endesc: At a random point during the first half of the Last Spurt, your speed will increase; the value scales with the number of your fans

jpdesc: ラストスパートの最中に速度がわずかに上がる
endesc: At a random point during the first half of the Last Spurt, your speed will slightly increase

jpdesc: レース中盤にしばらくの間前に出る
endesc: At a random point during the Middle Leg, you will get a speed boost

jpdesc: 直線で速度がすごく上がる
endesc: At a random point on a random straight, your speed will greatly increase

jpdesc: レース中盤に速度がすごく上がる
endesc: At a random point in the Middle Leg, your speed will greatly increase

jpdesc: スタート時に加速力が上がるその後ラストスパートの最中にわずかに前に出る＜作戦・逃げ＞
endesc: Runner・At the start of the race, your acceleration will increase; then, at a random point during the first half of the Last Spurt, you will get a slight speed boost

jpdesc: 終盤の最終コーナーで中団以前にいる時ゴールまで遠いと加速力が上がるその後最終直線でわずかに前に出る＜先行/差し＞
endesc: Leader/Betweener・If you're on the Final Corner in the Final Leg, you're not in the back of the pack, and there's at least 600 m remaining in the race, your acceleration will greatly increase; then, during the Final Straight, you will get a slight speed boost

jpdesc: レース終盤が迫ったとき中団以降にいると速度が上がるその後ラストスパートの最中にわずかに前に出る＜作戦・追込＞
endesc: Chaser・If you're not in the front at a random point during the second half of the Middle Leg, your speed will increase; then, at a random point during the first half of the Last Spurt, you will get a slight speed boost

jpdesc: 最終コーナーで加速力が上がる芝のレースならしばらくの間加速力が上がる＜マイル＞
enname: Winter's Beauty Under the Waning Moon
endesc: Mile・At a random point during the Final Corner, your acceleration will increase; the effect lasts longer in Turf races

jpdesc: 下り坂で速度がすごく上がりさらに自身を除くチームメンバーの速度がわずかに上がる＜マイル＞
enname: Blooming in Sickness and in Health
endesc: Mile・At a random point on a random downhill, your own speed will increase greatly and the speed of all your teammates will increase slightly

jpname: 我が意、即ち天の理なり
jpdesc: 2000m以上のレースならラストスパートで加速力が上がる＜追込・芝＞
endesc: Chaser・Turf・During the Last Spurt in races of 2000 m or more, your acceleration will increase

jpdesc: レース中盤始めの方に中団以降にいると速度が上がるその後レース終盤が迫ったとき少し前に出る＜中距離＞
endesc: Medium・If you're not in the front at a random point during the first half of the Middle Leg, your speed will increase; then, at a random point during the second half of the Middle Leg, you will get a speed boost

jpdesc: レース中盤始めの方に中団以降にいると速度がすごく上がり持久力を少し回復する＜中距離/長距離＞
endesc: Medium/Long・If you're not in the front at a random point during the first half of the Middle Leg, your speed will greatly increase and your stamina will recover

jpdesc: レース中間地点で中団以降にいると短い間前に出る、短距離かマイルレースならその後ラストスパートで短い間すごく前に出る
endesc: If you're not in the front halfway through the race, you will get a speed boost; (Short/Mile only) then, during the Last Spurt, you will get a great speed boost

jpdesc: レース終盤始めの方で中団以降にいると加速力が上がる＜マイル＞
endesc: Mile・If you're not in the front at a random point during the first half of the Final Leg, your acceleration will increase

jpdesc: レース終盤始めの方で中団以降にいると加速力がわずかに上がる＜マイル＞
endesc: Mile・If you're not in the front at a random point during the first half of the Final Leg, your acceleration will slightly increase

jpdesc: レース中盤に中団以降にいると速度がわずかに上がる＜マイル＞
endesc: Mile・If you're not in the front at a random point during the Middle Leg, your speed will slightly increase

jpdesc: ラストスパートの最中に速度がわずかに上がる＜長距離＞
endesc: Long・At a random point during the first half of the Last Spurt, your speed will slightly increase

jpdesc: レース終盤始めの方にしばらくの間前に出る、マイルレースだとしばらくの間すごく前に出る＜短距離/マイル＞
endesc: Short/Mile・During the first half of the Final Leg, your speed will increase; it will increase greatly in Mile races

jpdesc: 終盤始めの方で中団以降にいると持久力を少し使って加速力が上がる、マイルレースだと終盤始めの方早めに持久力を少し使って加速力がすごく上がる＜芝＞
endesc: Turf・If you're not in the front at a random point during the first half of the Final Leg, use a little extra stamina to increase your acceleration; in Mile races, the skill triggers in the first quarter of the Final Leg and increases acceleration greatly
evo_cond: 嬉しい気持ちは何マイル？

jpdesc: レース後半の第3コーナーで中団にいると少しの間速度が上がるその後終盤の最終直線で追い抜こうとすると速度がわずかに上がる
enname: Deceive Thy Foe and Be Certain of Victory
endesc: If you're in the middle of the pack in the second half of the race on corner 3, your speed will increase; then, when you're about to overtake someone on the Final Straight, your speed will increase slightly

jpdesc: レース中盤に中団で競り合うと持久力を少し回復し速度がすごく上がる＜中距離＞
endesc: Medium・If you're in the middle of the pack during the Middle Leg and someone is blocking you from the side, your speed will greatly increase and your stamina will slightly recover

jpdesc: レース後半にすごく前に出る＜作戦・差し＞
endesc: Betweener・At a random point during the second half of the race, your speed will greatly increase

jpname: 深淵のテルプシコラー
jpdesc: レース終盤に後方にいると少し前に出るマイルレースで最後方付近に控え続けているとすごく前に出る
endesc: If you're in the second half of the pack during the Final Leg, you will get a slight speed boost; the effect is much stronger if the race is Mile and you've been at the back of the pack (last 30%) the entire time until now

jpdesc: 終盤が迫ったどこかで前方にいると速度を少し上げ続けるさらに3番手以内なら加速力をちょっと上げ続ける＜中距離＞
endesc: Medium・If you're in the first half of the pack at a random point during the second half of the Middle Leg, your speed will slightly increase; if you're third or better, your acceleration will also slightly increase

jpdesc: 左回りコースが得意になりスピードとパワーが上昇する
endesc: Your Speed and Power stats are increased by 60 on counterclockwise tracks
